response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's an experience designed to elevate your daily life. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. To make this opportunity even more enticing, I am offering it to you for $200. If you're interested in experiencing the benefits firsthand, please let me know so we can arrange the transaction.", "product_price": 200}
